thread.title: 2Way Supply Advises Restaurants on the Customer Service, Efficiency and ROI Advantages of New Motorola DLR Digital Two-Way Radios
thread.title_full: 2Way Supply Advises Restaurants on the Customer Service, Efficiency and ROI Advantages of New Motorola DLR Digital Two-Way Radios

author: KEN BRASWELL
title: 2Way Supply Advises Restaurants on the Customer Service, Efficiency and ROI Advantages of New Motorola DLR Digital Two-Way Radios
text:
“There are millions of restaurants across the nation that rely on effective and efficient communication in order to achieve their customer service standards, and ensure streamlined operations that drive ROI and profitability,” commented Ken Braswell, the owner of 2Way Supply. “We’re pleased that Motorola is taking a leading role in helping restaurants achieve these critical objectives with a state-of-the-art, game changing solution.” According to Braswell and his team at 2Way Supply, restaurants will particularly benefit from the fact that the DLRs offer license-free operation, and as such is no need to pay for regulatory licenses or administrative fees.
Other key benefits include: compact and lightweight design, immediate response, ease-of-use with voice prompts and configuration menus, enhanced privacy including private reply, extreme range (up to 300,000 square feet/20 floors), talk permit zones, instant mute, home channel, call all available direct call, and antimicrobial protection that that inhibit the growth of bacteria and mold on radio surfaces.
Restaurants will also benefit from the DLR’s long battery life, and multi-unit chargers that charge up to 12 radios at a time are also available.
More information on the groundbreaking new DLR Digital two-way radios can be found on the 2Way Supply website: http://2waysupply.com
About 2Way Supply
2Way Supply is an authorized Motorola dealer specializing in Motorola 2Way radios, parts and accessories. It is a wholly owned subsidiary and a Texas based business. 2Way Supply (2waysupply.com) serves as an easy-to-use e-commerce site for Motorola 2Way radios and accessories and features low prices on a great selection of needed items for restaurants as well as industrial, entertainment, sports, property management, construction, safety, and business clients.
